    searchSolution(int, Graph) - Method in class com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.tsp.TemplateTSP

    searchSolution(int, Graph) - Method in interface com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.tsp.TSP
    Search for a shortest cost hamiltonian circuit in g within timeLimit milliseconds (returns the best found tour whenever the time limit is reached) Warning: The computed tour always start from vertex 0
    Section - Class in com.pld.agile.model.entity

    SeqIter - Class in com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.tsp
    The SeqIter class implements an Iterator for traversing the set of unvisited vertices that are successors of a given current vertex in a graph.
    SeqIter(Collection<Integer>, int, Graph) - Constructor for class com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.tsp.SeqIter
    Creates an iterator to traverse the set of vertices in unvisited that are successors of currentVertex in the graph g.

    Solver - Class in com.pld.agile.model
    The Solver class is responsible for solving a Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) based on a plan of intersections and sections.

    SolvingStrategy - Interface in com.pld.agile.model.strategy
